The sum of the primes below $10$ is $2 + 3 + 5 + 7 = 17$.
<br>
Find the sum of all the primes below two million.

## R

### Answer 1 - Sieve

```{r}
#| cache: true

sieve <- function(n) {
  x <- 2:n
  p <- c()
  while(length(x) > 0) {
    p <- c(p, x[1])
    # incremental elimination
    x <- x[x %% x[1] != 0]
  }
  return(p)
}

tic()
x <- sieve(2e6)
sum(x)
toc()
```
